Burning Blood.label: Burning Blood
Burning Blood.description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

Cracked Core.label: Cracked Core
Cracked Core.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Lightning.

Pure Water.label: Pure Water
Pure Water.description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle into your hand.

Ring of the Snake.label: Ring of the Snake
Ring of the Snake.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Akabeko.label: Akabeko
Akabeko.description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

Ancient Tea Set.label: Ancient Tea Set
Ancient Tea Set.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with [E] [E] .

Art of War.label: Art of War
Art of War.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn, gain an additional [E] next turn.

Bag of Marbles.label: Bag of Marbles
Bag of Marbles.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Bag of Preparation.label: Bag of Preparation
Bag of Preparation.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

Blood Vial.label: Blood Vial
Blood Vial.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

Centennial Puzzle.label: Centennial Puzzle
Centennial Puzzle.description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

Ceramic Fish.label: Ceramic Fish
Ceramic Fish.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

Damaru.label: Damaru
Damaru.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.

Dream Catcher.label: Dream Catcher
Dream Catcher.description: Whenever you Rest, you may add a card into your deck.

Juzu Bracelet.label: Juzu Bracelet
Juzu Bracelet.description: Normal enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

Lantern.label: Lantern
Lantern.description: Start each combat with an additional [E] .

MawBank.label: Maw Bank
MawBank.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at a shop.

Meal Ticket.label: Meal Ticket
Meal Ticket.description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.

Nunchaku.label: Nunchaku
Nunchaku.description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain [E] .

Omamori.label: Omamori
Omamori.description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

Orichalcum.label: Orichalcum
Orichalcum.description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

Pen Nib.label: Pen Nib
Pen Nib.description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

Preserved Insect.label: Preserved Insect
Preserved Insect.description: Enemies in Elite combats have 25% less HP.

Red Skull.label: Red Skull
Red Skull.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

Regal Pillow.label: Regal Pillow
Regal Pillow.description: Whenever you Rest, heal an additional 15 HP.

Smiling Mask.label: Smiling Mask
Smiling Mask.description: The Merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

Snecko Skull.label: Snecko Skull
Snecko Skull.description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

Strawberry.label: Strawberry
Strawberry.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7.

Boot.label: The Boot
Boot.description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to 5.

Tiny Chest.label: Tiny Chest
Tiny Chest.description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.

Toy Ornithopter.label: Toy Ornithopter
Toy Ornithopter.description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.

Blue Candle.label: Blue Candle
Blue Candle.description: Unplayable Curse cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Curse, lose 1 HP and Exhaust it.

Bottled Flame.label: Bottled Flame
Bottled Flame.description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Bottled Lightning.label: Bottled Lightning
Bottled Lightning.description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Bottled Tornado.label: Bottled Tornado
Bottled Tornado.description: Upon pickup, choose a Power card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

Darkstone Periapt.label: Darkstone Periapt
Darkstone Periapt.description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

Duality.label: Duality
Duality.description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.

Eternal Feather.label: Eternal Feather
Eternal Feather.description: For every 5 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

Frozen Egg.label: Frozen Egg
Frozen Egg.description: Whenever you add a Power card into your deck, Upgrade it.

Gold-Plated Cables.label: Gold-Plated Cables
Gold-Plated Cables.description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.

Gremlin Horn.label: Gremlin Horn
Gremlin Horn.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

Horn Cleat.label: Horn Cleat
Horn Cleat.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 14 Block.

InkBottle.label: Ink Bottle
InkBottle.description: Whenever you play 10 cards, draw 1 card.

Kunai.label: Kunai
Kunai.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

Letter Opener.label: Letter Opener
Letter Opener.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

Matryoshka.label: Matryoshka
Matryoshka.description: The next 2 non-Boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.

Meat on the Bone.label: Meat on the Bone
Meat on the Bone.description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Mercury Hourglass.label: Mercury Hourglass
Mercury Hourglass.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Molten Egg.label: Molten Egg
Molten Egg.description: Whenever you add an Attack into your deck, Upgrade it.

Mummified Hand.label: Mummified Hand
Mummified Hand.description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 that turn.

Ninja Scroll.label: Ninja Scroll
Ninja Scroll.description: At the start of each combat, add 3 Shivs into your hand.

Ornamental Fan.label: Ornamental Fan
Ornamental Fan.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

Pantograph.label: Pantograph
Pantograph.description: At the start of Boss combats, heal 25 HP.

Paper Krane.label: Paper Krane
Paper Krane.description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

Paper Phrog.label: Paper Phrog
Paper Phrog.description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

Pear.label: Pear
Pear.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.

Question Card.label: Question Card
Question Card.description: Future card rewards have 1 additional card to choose from.

Self-Forming Clay.label: Self-Forming Clay
Self-Forming Clay.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain 3 Block next turn.

Shuriken.label: Shuriken
Shuriken.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

Singing Bowl.label: Singing Bowl
Singing Bowl.description: When adding cards into your deck, you may raise your Max HP by 2 instead.

Sundial.label: Sundial
Sundial.description: Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain [E] [E] .

Symbiotic Virus.label: Symbiotic Virus
Symbiotic Virus.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Dark.

The Courier.label: The Courier
The Courier.description: The Merchant restocks cards, relics, and potions. All prices are reduced by 20%.

Toxic Egg.label: Toxic Egg
Toxic Egg.description: Whenever you add a Skill into your deck, Upgrade it.

White Beast Statue.label: White Beast Statue
White Beast Statue.description: Potions always appear in combat rewards.

Bird-Faced Urn.label: Bird-Faced Urn
Bird-Faced Urn.description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.

Calipers.label: Calipers
Calipers.description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

CaptainsWheel.label: Captain's Wheel
CaptainsWheel.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

Champion Belt.label: Champion Belt
Champion Belt.description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply 1 Weak.

CharonsAshes.label: Charon's Ashes
CharonsAshes.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Cloak Clasp.label: Cloak Clasp
Cloak Clasp.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.

Dead Branch.label: Dead Branch
Dead Branch.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.

Du-Vu Doll.label: Du-Vu Doll
Du-Vu Doll.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 Strength.

Emotion Chip.label: Emotion Chip
Emotion Chip.description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

Fossilized Helix.label: Fossilized Helix
Fossilized Helix.description: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat.

Gambling Chip.label: Gambling Chip
Gambling Chip.description: At the start of each combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

Ginger.label: Ginger
Ginger.description: You can no longer become Weakened.

Girya.label: Girya
Girya.description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites (up to 3 times).

Golden Eye.label: Golden Eye
Golden Eye.description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.

Ice Cream.label: Ice Cream
Ice Cream.description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

Lizard Tail.label: Lizard Tail
Lizard Tail.description: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

Magic Flower.label: Magic Flower
Magic Flower.description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

Mango.label: Mango
Mango.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14.

Peace Pipe.label: Peace Pipe
Peace Pipe.description: You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.

Pocketwatch.label: Pocketwatch
Pocketwatch.description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

Prayer Wheel.label: Prayer Wheel
Prayer Wheel.description: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward.

Shovel.label: Shovel
Shovel.description: You can now Dig for relics at Rest Sites.

Stone Calendar.label: Stone Calendar
Stone Calendar.description: At the end of turn 7, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.

The Specimen.label: The Specimen
The Specimen.description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

Thread and Needle.label: Thread and Needle
Thread and Needle.description: Start each combat with 4 Plated Armor.

Tingsha.label: Tingsha
Tingsha.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

Torii.label: Torii
Torii.description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.

Tough Bandages.label: Tough Bandages
Tough Bandages.description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.

Tungsten Rod.label: Tungsten Rod
Tungsten Rod.description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

Turnip.label: Turnip
Turnip.description: You can no longer become Frail.

Unceasing Top.label: Unceasing Top
Unceasing Top.description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

Wing Boots.label: Wing Boots
Wing Boots.description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.

Astrolabe.label: Astrolabe
Astrolabe.description: Upon pickup, Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

Black Blood.label: Black Blood
Black Blood.description: Replaces Burning Blood. At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

Black Star.label: Black Star
Black Star.description: Elites drop an additional relic when defeated.

Busted Crown.label: Busted Crown
Busted Crown.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future card rewards have 2 less cards to choose from.

Calling Bell.label: Calling Bell
Calling Bell.description: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics.

Coffee Dripper.label: Coffee Dripper
Coffee Dripper.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.

Cursed Key.label: Cursed Key
Cursed Key.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a Curse.

Ectoplasm.label: Ectoplasm
Ectoplasm.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

Empty Cage.label: Empty Cage
Empty Cage.description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

Frozen Core.label: Frozen Core
Frozen Core.description: Replaces Cracked Core. If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost.

Fusion Hammer.label: Fusion Hammer
Fusion Hammer.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

Holy Water.label: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand.

Hovering Kite.label: Hovering Kite
Hovering Kite.description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain [E] .

Mark of Pain.label: Mark of Pain
Mark of Pain.description: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Wounds into your draw pile.

Nuclear Battery.label: Nuclear Battery
Nuclear Battery.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

Pandora's Box.label: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.description: Upon pickup, Transform all Strike and Defend cards.

Philosophers Stone.label: Philosopher's Stone
Philosophers Stone.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. ALL enemies start combat with 1 Strength.

Ring of the Serpent.label: Ring of the Serpent
Ring of the Serpent.description: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

Runic Cube.label: Runic Cube
Runic Cube.description: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card.

Runic Dome.label: Runic Dome
Runic Dome.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.

Runic Pyramid.label: Runic Pyramid
Runic Pyramid.description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

SlaversCollar.label: Slaver's Collar
SlaversCollar.description: During Boss and Elite combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

Snecko Eye.label: Snecko Eye
Snecko Eye.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Start each combat Confused.

Sozu.label: Sozu
Sozu.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer obtain potions.

Tiny House.label: Tiny House
Tiny House.description: Upon pickup, obtain 1 potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card.

Velvet Choker.label: Velvet Choker
Velvet Choker.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

Violet Lotus.label: Violet Lotus
Violet Lotus.description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional [E] .

Wrist Blade.label: Wrist Blade
Wrist Blade.description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.

Brimstone.label: Brimstone
Brimstone.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.

Chemical X.label: Chemical X
Chemical X.description: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by 2.

Dollys Mirror.label: Dolly's Mirror
Dollys Mirror.description: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.

Frozen Eye.label: Frozen Eye
Frozen Eye.description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

Hand Drill.label: Hand Drill
Hand Drill.description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

Lee's Waffle.label: Lee's Waffle
Lee's Waffle.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

Medical Kit.label: Medical Kit
Medical Kit.description: Unplayable Status cards can now be played. Whenever you play a Status card, Exhaust it.

Melange.label: Melange
Melange.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.

Orange Pellets.label: Orange Pellets
Orange Pellets.description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.

Orrery.label: Orrery
Orrery.description: Upon pickup, choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

Prismatic Shard.label: Prismatic Shard
Prismatic Shard.description: Combat reward screens now contain Colorless cards and cards from other colors.

Runic Capacitor.label: Runic Capacitor
Runic Capacitor.description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

Sling of Courage.label: Sling of Courage
Sling of Courage.description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

Strange Spoon.label: Strange Spoon
Strange Spoon.description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

The Abacus.label: The Abacus
The Abacus.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain 6 Block.

Toolbox.label: Toolbox
Toolbox.description: At the start of each combat, choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

Twisted Funnel.label: Twisted Funnel
Twisted Funnel.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

Bloody Idol.label: Bloody Idol
Bloody Idol.description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP.

Enchiridion.label: Enchiridion
Enchiridion.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 for that turn.

Face Of Cleric.label: Face Of Cleric
Face Of Cleric.description: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.

Mutagenic Strength.label: Mutagenic Strength
Mutagenic Strength.description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. At the end of your first turn, lose 3 Strength.

NlothsGift.label: N'loth's Gift
NlothsGift.description: Triple the chance of finding Rare cards from combat rewards.

NlothsHungryFace.label: N'loth's Hungry Face
NlothsHungryFace.description: The next non-Boss chest you open is empty.

Necronomicon.label: Necronomicon
Necronomicon.description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. Upon pickup, obtain a special Curse.

NeowsBlessing.label: Neow's Lament
NeowsBlessing.description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP.

NilrysCodex.label: Nilry's Codex
NilrysCodex.description: At the end of your turn, you may shuffle 1 of 3 random cards into your draw pile.

Odd Mushroom.label: Odd Mushroom
Odd Mushroom.description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more attack damage rather than 50%.

Red Mask.label: Red Mask
Red Mask.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

Ssserpent Head.label: Ssserpent Head
Ssserpent Head.description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold.

Warped Tongs.label: Warped Tongs
Warped Tongs.description: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
